findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled on a WordPress API endpoint can allow attackers to read sensitive page data from authenticated users' sessions.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create a malicious website that makes XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials. If a logged-in Plex user visits the malicious site, their browser will send the request with cookies, allowing the attacker to read the response data including potentially sensitive page content or metadata.
